Posts.Content: Jun 24, 2009 03:27AM jeril12 wrote: Hi, I had Chemo and Radiation in 2003, and yes same thing....I used silver sulfadiazine cream, your doctor should have it. I tried to sleep with nothing on my breast but the cream, air helped.... It took a while for the burns and scares to go away, but they did... Good Luck
Posts.Title: Severe radiation burns to the breast RCindy
